Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the extent of the attack by stating that Kamlesh Mandriya was specifically targeted by the Left at JNU. The provided evidence does not directly support this claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that Kamlesh Mandriya was attacked by the Left at JNU. The evidence provided only includes photographs of Mandriya with head injuries and billboards with the hashtag #LeftAttackstudents, but there is no direct evidence linking these to the Left.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Left was responsible for the attack on Kamlesh Mandriya without providing concrete evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the attack on Kamlesh Mandriya may not have been carried out by the Left, as the evidence provided does not directly link the Left to the attack.
